knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

```{r libraries, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r data}
loans <- read_csv("~/Econ 352/HW2/HW3/all_llma_nc.csv")
limits <- read_csv("~/Econ 352/HW2/HW3/conformingloanlimits.csv")
```

```{r q_1}
sapply(loans, class)

```
```{r q_2}
loans <- loans %>% 
 filter(year >= 1992 & year <= 2007,
         product_type == 10,
         original_term == 360 | original_term == 180,
         loan_type == 1,
         loan_purpose %in% c(1, 2, 3, 5)
         )
```


```{r q_3}
loans <- merge(loans, limits,by="year")
```


```{r q_4}
loans <- loans %>%
  mutate(deviation = log(original_balance) - log(conformingloanlimit))
```

```{r q_5}
bins <- loans %>% 
  mutate(deviation_bin = cut(deviation, breaks=200))

bins <- bins %>%
  filter(deviation < 0.5) %>%
  filter(deviation > -0.5)
  


```

```{r q_6}
total <- count(bins)

bin_share <- bins %>%
  group_by(deviation_bin) %>%
  summarize(share = n())

```

```{r q_6}
ggplot(data = bins, aes(x=deviation_bin)) +
  geom_bar()

```
